main event: A person reported seeing an unidentified object in Terrace Park, Ohio on November 18, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as a sparkling bright white color and was silent,The estimated speed of the object was claimed to be faster than 15 mph,The observer reported the object disappeared to the east after appearing to move behind clouds,The object seemed to cover about 2.5 match heads when observed at arm's length,The sighting lasted for 2 seconds and was positioned 5-6 miles away from the observer.
